---
title: "Australian RSPCA "
output: html_notebook
---

```{r}
library(here)
library(tidyverse)
```


```{r}
animal_complaints <-read_csv(here(
  "clean_data/animal_complaints_clean.csv"))

animal_complaints_per_suburbs <-read_csv(here(
  "clean_data/animal_complaints_tot_per_suburb.csv"))

animal_outcomes_clean <-read_csv(here(
  "clean_data/animal_outcomes_clean.csv"))

brisbane_complaints <- read_csv(here(
  "clean_data/brisbane_complaints_clean.csv"))

animal_complaints 
animal_complaints_per_suburbs
animal_outcomes_clean
brisbane_complaints
```

```{r}
ggplot(animal_complaints) +
  geom_bar(position = "dodge", aes(x = complaint_type, fill = animal_type))
```

```{r}
animal_complaints_per_suburbs %>% 
  filter(animal_type == "dog") %>% 
  filter(total > 100) %>% 
  ggplot() +
  geom_col(aes(x = suburb, y = total, fill = complaint_type)) +
  theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 45, hjust = 1))
```

```{r}
animal_outcomes_clean %>% 
  ggplot() +
  geom_col(position = "dodge", aes(x = state, y = tot_outcomes, fill = outcome)) +
  theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 90, hjust = 1)) +
  facet_wrap(~ animal_type)
```

```{r}
animal_outcomes_clean %>% 
  filter(animal_type == "Cats" & outcome == "Euthanized") %>%
  group_by(year, outcome) %>% 
  summarise(tot_outcomes = sum(tot_outcomes)) %>% 
  ungroup() %>% 
  ggplot() +
  geom_line(aes(x = year, y = tot_outcomes, group = outcome))
```

```{r}
animal_outcomes_clean %>% 
  filter(animal_type == "Cats" & outcome == "Rehomed") %>%
  group_by(year, outcome) %>% 
  summarise(tot_outcomes = sum(tot_outcomes)) %>% 
  ungroup() %>% 
  ggplot() +
  geom_line(aes(x = year, y = tot_outcomes, group = outcome))
```

```{r}
brisbane_complaints %>% 
  ggplot() +
  geom_bar(aes(x = category)) +
  theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 90, hjust = 1))
```
